Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of IrO2/yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) cermet cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells was experimentally evaluated in relation to their microstructure.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of IrO2-YSZ nanocomposite electrodes by MOCVD

Sentencas: Noble metal films were prepared by MOCVD using metal-acetyl acetonate precursors which were mixed and evaporated together (493 K) to achieve codeposition.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of IrO2-YSZ nanocomposite electrodes by MOCVD

Sentencas: The effects of experimental conditions on deposition rates, composition and microstructure were studied, and the optimum conditions were determined.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of IrO2-YSZ nanocomposite electrodes by MOCVD

Sentencas: The growth of the films was columnar and layered in structure, with porous morphology.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of IrO2-YSZ nanocomposite electrodes by MOCVD

Sentencas: TEM observations revealed that the IrO2-YSZ composites are constituted by single-phase particles, between 4 and 10 nm in size, with an excellent composite distribution.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of IrO2-YSZ nanocomposite electrodes by MOCVD

Sentencas: The cathode-related polarization resistance, Rp, was measured by impedance spectroscopy and found to be in the range of 21-968 Omega cm(2) under the experimental conditions (573-873 K).
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of IrO2-YSZ nanocomposite electrodes by MOCVD

Sentencas: lrO(2)-YSZ electrodes undergo structural and/or morphological changes caused by cathodic polarization and high temperature (873 K).
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of IrO2-YSZ nanocomposite electrodes by MOCVD

Sentencas: However, this behavior could contribute to the improvement of the electrochemical performance of the electrode.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of IrO2-YSZ nanocomposite electrodes by MOCVD

Sentencas: lrO(2)-YSZ films displayed superior electrochemical properties as electrodes to zirconia electrolytes than that exhibited for the Pt-C and conventional Pt paste electrodes.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of IrO2-YSZ nanocomposite electrodes by MOCVD
